choices: Create your own (please leave more options in this chapter)
1.content:
As you might know, there are at least 20 Dollhouses around the world with only two of them being shown in the show so they will be the only ones on this list (with the exception of the "create your own" options.

The last option is for if you want the story to take place during the "Thought-pocalypse"

If you don't, have no idea what's going on, and/or need a refresher, please check the Dollhouse wiki

http://dollhouse.wikia.com/wiki/Dollhous...
1.title: Choose which Dollhouse you want to start in

choices: Create your own (leave multiple options here)
11.content:
Who should be the main character and gain weight?

For the create your own option: First of all, leave more blank options for other people to have fun.
Second, remember that the LA dolls are named after the NATO alphabet. Here's a link to a list of it:
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/co...
Oh, and please use the modern NATO alphabet and to use the more feminine sounding names for the females (don't know why I have to say that but I feel like I have to, just in case)
Third, the Dollhouse probably reuses names (there are references to this such as the previous Sierra) due to the fact that the doll contracts last only for five years, and there's a chance of death or being insane and going on a killing spree.
Forth: You can just call the options "Blank" or something and let me deal with the renaming for when it's used and the name has been picked by someone.
11.title: L. A. Dollhouse

choices: Before she joined the Dollhouse (as Caroline Farrell)
After she joined the Dollhouse but before the events of the first episode

1112.title: After she joined the Dollhouse but before the e...

choices: Helen wakes up in the middle of the night feeling hungry
Nate wakes Helen up in the morning and feeds her breakfast
11122.content:
Echo's current imprint is named Helen Malone. She is the dream date for some rich and important businessman, Nate Summers who has a fetish about stuffing beautiful women, watching them eat, watching their tight clothes pop/rip off, etc. (and he has ties to the Rossum Corporation). For this engagement, Topher, the LA House's programmer, altered her glands or something to make her gain weight a little bit easier and faster (kind of like what he did to Echo in "Instinct" of season 2).

As far as Helen is concerned, she has always wanted to get fat, but since most guys don't like fat women (and being in southern California isn't helping any) she had never gained a lot of weight on purpose. But all of that changed when she met Nate. She met him while she was at a fancy all-you-can-eat restaurant, stuffing herself after her boyfriend broke up with her for "getting too fat" (she only gained 2 pounds). She was wearing a dark red button up t-shirt with the top button unbuttoned to show some cleavage and dark blue pants. She noticed Nate watching her eat a whole cake (about 4 in radius and 1 in tall) all by herself and started to tease him by eating it in a kinky way and "accidentally" dropping a few (kind of big) pieces in-between her boobs and asked him to help to get the pieces out since she was using both of her hands (one to feed her, what seems to be, never-ending hunger, and other to hold her plate closer to her mouth). He gladly helped her and feed her the pieces and the rest of the cake (and two more after that one). They talked for a while and Nate invited Helen to his home after she was done with the cakes. Helen, being so full and being comfortable around Nate, just went to sleep in his bed.
11122.title: Engagement

choices: Only eat a couple and eat the rest when Nate wakes up.
111221.content:
Helen awoke around midnight to the sound of her stomach growling. As she laid there for a while, she remember what happened last night and turned to see if Nate was with her. He wasn't, which made her cry a bit, thinking that she was just some one night stand or something. Her stomach growled again. As she started to get up, the button on her pants popped off, which made her giggle a little bit. She looked in a nearby mirror to see her new potbelly. and cupped it with her hands.

I wonder if Nate has any food? Helen wondered.

As she made it out of Nate's room, she saw him on a couch, sleeping in a sitting position, and she notices a folded paper and the table in front of the couch with the words "To Helen" on it. She picked it up, unfolded it, and started reading:

          As you might have noticed, you decided to "borrow" my bed last night (I"m not mad or anything). I slept on the couch instead of with you so you wouldn't of thought I was talking advantage of you. If you wake up before me, you are welcome to anything I might be laying around in the kitchen.
         -Nate-

Helen smiled at the fact that Nate didn't leave her, but she smiled even more when she read "anything". She really wanted to kiss him but decided not to just in case she woke him up. She walked quietly into Nate's kitchen and saw a box of a dozen creme filled donuts on the counter with another note from Nate. This one read:

          These are filled with an extra "kick" if you decided to put on a few more pounds of beauty.

Helen closed her eyes, picturing herself hugging Nate, kissing him, getting bigger for him, having him touch her growing ass, placing his face in her boobs. She then opened her eyes and licked her lips.

Should she.......
111221.title: Helen wakes up in the middle of the night feeli...

choices: Wakes up in the morning, before Nate, fatter than before
Nate wakes Helen up and he feeds her breakfast
1112212.content:
Helen decided to surprise Nate with a bigger body. She started on her first doughnut and tasted the fatty chocolate creme filling and the rich, thick, glaze. As she savored her first bite, she went to the fridge to see if Nate has any milk. She found a full gallon jug and took it out while she was finishing her first doughnut. Helen didn't even bother getting a glass and just opened the jug and took a moderate sized gulp. She then went back to her doughnuts. She takes a bite of a fatty fried snack, a couple swigs of milk, and repeats this pattern until all of the dozen doughnuts and the jug of milk are gone.
As she was eating, she felt her body getting bigger and bigger, and she was loving it. Her belly, along with her boobs, pushed out against her buttons, staining them to the limit. Her thighs and ass gotten nice and soft with fat, causing a little tears along the fabric.
Helen let out a little burp and started unbutton her shirt to rub her full, sexy, fat belly. Man, that was so good. she thought.I should go back to sleep.
As she gotten up, her fatter, sexier, body caught her by surprise. All of the weight made her tired, and the fact that she was already sleepy before didn't help any. She decided to lay down on the couch with her legs over the armrest opposite of Nate and her head next to his leg. She drifted into sleep as she was massaged her belly.
1112212.title: Eat them all.

12.content:
Who should be the lucky (or "lucky", depending on the point of view) woman to start to fatten up?


Due to the fact that the DC Dollhouse wasn't shown on-screen that much, we don't know what Athena and Cassandra look like, so feel free to make their own appearance. And in the case of the "create your own" options, well first of all MAKE SURE YOU DON"T START THE STORY RIGHT AWAY and LEAVE MULTIPLE OPTIONS for other people to have fun. Second, remember that the DC dolls are named after members in Greek myths.
12.title: D. C. Dollhouse

15.content: Who should the main character be?
15.title: Thought-pocalypse

info.brief_description: Just so we're clear, I mean the tv show, not the little houses little girls play with.
info.description:
The women of Joss Wheden's Dollhouse gain weight for whatever reason(s).

Rules:
No extreme weight gain in one chapter (lets have the limit per chapter about 50 lbs.)
No one weighing over 800 lbs.
No male weight gain.
No characters dieing (unless they die in the show or if the person is created for this story)
Try to make each story having at least 30 chapters before ending it. I would prefer stories not ending, but I do understand that some stories can't go on any longer (and some shouldn't). Just make it look good.
No giantess stuff (since it wouldn't "fit" as well as say some supernatural or hard sci-fi show).
No vore (same reason as above).
Sex is OK (even lesbian), just don't go into that much detail.
The woman/women gaining can loose the weight they gained but don't make them skinnier than they started.
Please write at least 250 words or so per chapter unless you are giving multiple options (example: the chapter starts with Echo bumping into someone, you can just end it there and give options for who she bumps into)
PLEASE spell check and try to use proper grammar as best as you can (but don't use really bad grammar that no one can understand what you wrote).
